snippet.title: Dunbar’s Number has limited relevance to social media - The Future Place Blog
snippet.description: * Dunbar’s Number has limited relevance to social media - The Future Place Blog (clueweb12-1014wb-23-22310) http://thefutureplace.typepad.com/the_future_place/2011/06/dunbars-number-has-limited-relevance-to-social-media.html ...was not talking about people we have regular communications with he was talking about stable social networks. A postman, a newsagent, a bus conductor have two-way networks well in excess of...talking about stable social networks. A postman, a newsagent, a bus conductor have two-way networks well in excess of 150, but these are not stable social networks because the people being interacted with are not necessary in a network with each other. When Dunbar talks about stable social relationships he is talking about groups we are a member of, not the number of people we are interested in or interacting with. If I were to live in... [cached version]
